name: InternCircle
tag_list: internship, intern, intern-network, internship-opportunities, intern-employment, advice-for-interns, summer-internship, intern-housing, best-internships, undergraduate-internship, graduate-internship, internship-guide
overview:
InternCircle.com is a virtual internship hub for interns and intern employers with a goal to maximize opportunities and foster valuable experiences through networking and informative platforms.

By providing the virtual space to stimulate positive experiences, InternCircle aims to relieve disconnect between interns and intern employers and bring the internship process closer.

InternCircle.com gives interns the free the opportunity to apply for internships directly, showcase your professional expertise, locate the perfect temporary housing, find the social hot spots, internship mainstream news and read advice from InternCircle and other industry gurus.

Internship employers can: â€¢ Post unlimited internship openings in an unlimited number of departments â€¢ Allow interns to apply directly through InternCircle with cover letter and resume â€¢ Numerous search engines to find interns based on what you need now â€¢ Read potential intern profiles that include recommendations, resumes, a â€œshowcaseâ€ of a personâ€™s best work â€¢ Connect with past interns and search through their profiles to find another intern that will benefit you â€¢ Be featured on Employer and Social pages â€¢ Recommend interns and allow interns to rate their experience with your company
